HomePage.title: Web Developer
HomePage.intro: I'm Killian, a web developer passionate about creating innovative online experiences. Explore my portfolio to see how I merge technology and creativity.

About.about_desc: With 5 years of experience in web development, I have worked on a variety of projects ranging from showcase sites to complex web applications. Learn more about my background and my passion for development.

Projects.pomodoro_desc: Website using the Pomodoro work technique, with music, timer management, a to-do list, theme management, and work statistics.
Projects.socnet_desc: Reproduction of a fictional social network with management of relationships, posts, comments, likes, and account management.
